vuepress-plugin-showvuedemoblock

# 配置

# locales

  • 类型：Array
  • 默认值
[
  {
    "lang": "zh-CN",
    "ui": {
      "hide-text": "隐藏代码",
      "show-text": "显示代码",
      "run-text": "在线编辑运行",
      "copy-text": "复制代码",
      "copy-success": "复制成功"
    }
  },
  {
    "lang": "en-US",
    "ui": {
      "hide-text": "Hide",
      "show-text": "Expand",
      "run-text": "run in codepen",
      "copy-text": "Copy",
      "copy-success": "Successful"
    }
  }
]

使用 locales 自定义国际化配置，插件将根据 Vuepress 中匹配的 lang 字段完成语言切换，点此查看 Vuepress 的多语言支持 (opens new window)。

← 快速上手
